findings.message: Plan uses `localStorage.getItem('prime_guest_uuid')` as CF auth token; Prime stores session token separately as `prime_guest_token` — using UUID will fail `validateGuestSessionToken`.
Blast radius still mentions `wrangler.toml` secret binding conflicts with out-of-band Pages secret model.
`answerComposer.test.ts` TC-02 incorrectly treated as extinct — `composeAssistantAnswer` still returns `'fallback'` as routing signal.
